original_text:
Since his days are determined,
    and the number of his months is with you,
    and you have appointed his limits that he cannot pass,
korean_text: 그의 날을 정하셨고 그의 달 수도 주께 있으므로 그의 규례를 정하여 넘어가지 못하게 하셨사온즉

sentences.original_text: and the number of his months is with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 달 수는 당신과 함께 있으며

sentences.original_text: and you have appointed his limits

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 한계를 넘을 수 없다
